question: Farmer Joe is organising crates of apples. What is the face value of the digit 7 in the number 578?
Joe is labelling a crate with the number 605. What is the place value of the digit 5 in that number?
In another crate, Joe finds the number 842. What is the face value of the digit 4 in this number?
Joe labels a crate with the number 942. What is the place value of the digit 9 in this number?
Joe checks the number on a crate of apples and sees 732. What is the face value of the digit 2 in this number?
Farmer Joe is organising a crate with the number 453. What is the place value of the digit 3 in this number?
Joe labels another crate with the number 964. What is the face value of the digit 6 in this number?
Joe finds the number 217 on a crate. What is the place value of the digit 1 in this number?
As Farmer Joe sorts a crate with the number 385, what is the face value of the digit 8 in this number?
Joe organises a crate with the number 745. What is the place value of the digit 4 in this number?
